verses.verse: And Bezaleel <S%H1212><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>: two cubits <S%H520><s%> and a half <S%H2677><s%> was the length <S%H753><s%> of it, and a cubit <S%H520><s%> and a half <S%H2677><s%> the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of it, and a cubit <S%H520><s%> and a half <S%H2677><s%> the height <S%H6967><s%> of it:

And he overlaid <S%H6823><s%> it with pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%> within <S%H1004><s%> and without <S%H2351><s%>, and made <S%H6213><s%> a crown <S%H2213><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> to it round about <S%H5439><s%>.

And he cast <S%H3332><s%> for it four <S%H702><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, to be set by the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H6471><s%> of it; even two <S%H8147><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> upon the one <S%H259><s%> side <S%H6763><s%> of it, and two <S%H8147><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> upon the other <S%H8145><s%> side <S%H6763><s%> of it.
And he made <S%H6213><s%> staves <S%H905><s%> of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>, and overlaid <S%H6823><s%> them with gold <S%H2091><s%>.
And he put <S%H935><s%> the staves <S%H905><s%> into the rings <S%H2885><s%> by the sides <S%H6763><s%> of the ark <S%H727><s%>, to bear <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%>.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> the mercy seat <S%H3727><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>: two cubits <S%H520><s%> and a half <S%H2677><s%> was the length <S%H753><s%> thereof, and one cubit <S%H520><s%> and a half <S%H2677><s%> the breadth <S%H7341><s%> thereof.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> cherubims <S%H3742><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, beaten out of one piece <S%H4749><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> he them, on the two <S%H8147><s%> ends <S%H7098><s%> of the mercy seat <S%H3727><s%>; on: or, out of, etc

One <S%H259><s%> cherub <S%H3742><s%> on the end <S%H7098><s%> on this side, and another <S%H259><s%> cherub <S%H3742><s%> on the other end <S%H7098><s%> on that side: out of the mercy seat <S%H3727><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> he the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> on the two <S%H8147><s%> ends <S%H7098><s%> <S%H7099><s%> thereof. on the end: or, out of, etc on the other end: or, out of, etc

And the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> spread out <S%H6566><s%> their wings <S%H3671><s%> on high <S%H4605><s%>, and covered <S%H5526><s%> with their wings <S%H3671><s%> over the mercy seat <S%H3727><s%>, with their faces <S%H6440><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to another <S%H251><s%>; even to the mercy seatward <S%H3727><s%> were the faces <S%H6440><s%> of the cherubims <S%H3742><s%>.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> the table <S%H7979><s%> of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>: two cubits <S%H520><s%> was the length <S%H753><s%> thereof, and a cubit <S%H520><s%> the breadth <S%H7341><s%> thereof, and a cubit <S%H520><s%> and a half <S%H2677><s%> the height <S%H6967><s%> thereof:
And he overlaid <S%H6823><s%> it with pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>, and made <S%H6213><s%> thereunto a crown <S%H2213><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.

Also he made <S%H6213><s%> thereunto a border <S%H4526><s%> of an handbreadth <S%H2948><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>; and made <S%H6213><s%> a crown <S%H2213><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> for the border <S%H4526><s%> thereof round about <S%H5439><s%>.

And he cast <S%H3332><s%> for it four <S%H702><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> the rings <S%H2885><s%> upon the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H6285><s%> that were in the four <S%H702><s%> feet <S%H7272><s%> thereof.
Over against <S%H5980><s%> the border <S%H4526><s%> were the rings <S%H2885><s%>, the places <S%H1004><s%> for the staves <S%H905><s%> to bear <S%H5375><s%> the table <S%H7979><s%>.
And he made <S%H6213><s%> the staves <S%H905><s%> of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>, and overlaid <S%H6823><s%> them with gold <S%H2091><s%>, to bear <S%H5375><s%> the table <S%H7979><s%>.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> which were upon the table <S%H7979><s%>, his dishes <S%H7086><s%>, and his spoons <S%H3709><s%>, and his bowls <S%H4518><s%>, and his covers <S%H7184><s%> to cover <S%H5258><s%> withal <S%H2004><s%>, of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>. to cover: or, to pour out withal

And he made <S%H6213><s%> the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>: of beaten work <S%H4749><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> he the candlestick <S%H4501><s%>; his shaft <S%H3409><s%>, and his branch <S%H7070><s%>, his bowls <S%H1375><s%>, his knops <S%H3730><s%>, and his flowers <S%H6525><s%>, were of the same:

And six <S%H8337><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> going out <S%H3318><s%> of the sides <S%H6654><s%> thereof; three <S%H7969><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> of the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> out of the one <S%H259><s%> side <S%H6654><s%> thereof, and three <S%H7969><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> of the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> out of the other <S%H8145><s%> side <S%H6654><s%> thereof:

Three <S%H7969><s%> bowls <S%H1375><s%> made after the fashion of almonds <S%H8246><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> branch <S%H7070><s%>, a knop <S%H3730><s%> and a flower <S%H6525><s%>; and three <S%H7969><s%> bowls <S%H1375><s%> made like almonds <S%H8246><s%> in another <S%H259><s%> branch <S%H7070><s%>, a knop <S%H3730><s%> and a flower <S%H6525><s%>: so throughout the six <S%H8337><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> going out <S%H3318><s%> of the candlestick <S%H4501><s%>.
And in the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> were four <S%H702><s%> bowls <S%H1375><s%> made like almonds <S%H8246><s%>, his knops <S%H3730><s%>, and his flowers <S%H6525><s%>:

And a knop <S%H3730><s%> under two <S%H8147><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> of the same, and a knop <S%H3730><s%> under two <S%H8147><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> of the same, and a knop <S%H3730><s%> under two <S%H8147><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> of the same, according to the six <S%H8337><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> going out <S%H3318><s%> of it.
Their knops <S%H3730><s%> and their branches <S%H7070><s%> were of the same: all of it was one <S%H259><s%> beaten work <S%H4749><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>.
And he made <S%H6213><s%> his seven <S%H7651><s%> lamps <S%H5216><s%>, and his snuffers <S%H4457><s%>, and his snuffdishes <S%H4289><s%>, of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>.
Of a talent <S%H3603><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> he it, and all the vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> the incense <S%H7004><s%> altar <S%H4196><s%> of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>: the length <S%H753><s%> of it was a cubit <S%H520><s%>, and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of it a cubit <S%H520><s%>; it was foursquare <S%H7251><s%>; and two cubits <S%H520><s%> was the height <S%H6967><s%> of it; the horns <S%H7161><s%> thereof were of the same.

And he overlaid <S%H6823><s%> it with pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>, both the top <S%H1406><s%> of it, and the sides <S%H7023><s%> thereof round about <S%H5439><s%>, and the horns <S%H7161><s%> of it: also he made <S%H6213><s%> unto it a crown <S%H2213><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> for it under the crown <S%H2213><s%> thereof, by the two <S%H8147><s%> corners <S%H6763><s%> of it, upon the two <S%H8147><s%> sides <S%H6654><s%> thereof, to be places <S%H1004><s%> for the staves <S%H905><s%> to bear <S%H5375><s%> it withal.
And he made <S%H6213><s%> the staves <S%H905><s%> of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>, and overlaid <S%H6823><s%> them with gold <S%H2091><s%>.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>, and the pure <S%H2889><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> of sweet spices <S%H5561><s%>, according to the work <S%H4639><s%> of the apothecary <S%H7543><s%>.
